channel.title: delivery delays on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in delivery delays on FinanClub

item.title: SPR
item.description: score:-10 Chances: Revenues rise in Q2 2023 despite stock slide. Positive impact of new partnership to research hypersonic travel. Boeing awarded military contract for Spirit-tied P-8 aircraft trainers. Expectation of ramping up 737 Max production by more than 20% by Boeing. Striking workers at a key Boeing supplier approve a new contract and will return to work.

item.title: BA
item.description: score:-54 Chances: Resumption of 737 Max deliveries to China after a 4-year halt. Boeing’s focus on sustainability and hiring ‘Elon Musk engineers’ for green initiatives. Positive recognition of Boeing’s top-performing suppliers. Securing an order for Dreamliner jets from Qantas. Potential rebound after a 7% drop since the last earnings report.
